medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sudden onset of abdominal pain this morning, with a history of gallstones and complications such as pancreatitis and cholangitis. Patient was in the Emergency Department for evaluation after being transferred from another facility.
medical_history.past_medical_history: COPD, mild dementia, hypertension (HTN), hyperlipidemia (HLD), arthritis, coronary artery disease (CAD) status post stent placement, history of gallstones, pancreatitis, choledocholithiasis, cholangitis, and previous ERCP with biliary stent.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes and mother with heart problems.
